file_content.text: Greetings, investor. Welcome to the Seario Memorial Showroom, which exhibits Czerka's incredible military innovations from four centuries of market leadership.
Greetings, investor. The CZ-198 Green Habitat Zone gathers the galaxy's finest flora and fauna, providing on-site genetic material for our projects.
Caution. Do not touch or approach the exhibits without supervision.
Many of these historically-significant weapons are available for purchase by acceptable clients. Please inquire at Information.
Vigilant energy levels at thirty-five percent. Please secure all data and exit the building immediately.
Warning. Vigilant energy levels at seventy-two percent. Czerka Corporation is now absolved of any culpability in your death.
Final warning. Vigilant energy levels at ninety-four percent. Time to reach minimum safe distance has expired.
